dcterms:description: MIMIC-IV is a comprehensive EHR dataset from the Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center, covering patient data from 2008 to 2019, including records from over 431,000 visits and 180,000 patients. The dataset includes detailed temporal information on medical events such as procedures, medications, and lab results, along with demographic information such as age.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-IV
